Tingkatkan Kenyamanan Pelanggan, Fitur-fitur Baru Perkaya Aplikasi AXISnet
04 Nov 2019, 10:18 by Heri Firmansyah



Tingkatkan Kenyamanan Pelanggan, Fitur-fitur Baru Perkaya Aplikasi AXISnet



Tingkatkan Kenyamanan Pelanggan, Fitur-fitur Baru Perkaya Aplikasi AXISnet


KBRN, Jakarta :  PT XL Axiata Tbk (XL Axiata) melalui brand AXIS terus berupaya mempermudah pelanggan segmen anak muda untuk mendapatkan produk layanan melalui saluran digital yaitu aplikasi AXISnet.
Sarana berbasis digital yang telah diluncurkan sejak tahun 2016 tersebut kini telah diperkaya dengan sejumlah fitur yang semakin mempermudah pelanggan mendapatkan berbagai informasi dan manfaat tentang berbagai layanan AXIS. Pelanggan sudah bisa memanfaatkan fitur-fitur yang dimaksud mulai 1 November 2019, melalui aplikasi AXISnet yang dapat diunduh melalui Playstore bagi pengguna Android dan menyusul dalam waktu dekat di Apple Store bagi pengguna iOS. Chief Marketing Officer XL Axiata, David Arcelus Oses mengatakan, pihaknya terus berinovasi menghadirkan layanan yang lebih menyenangkan bagi pelanggan setia AXIS yang sebagian besar dari kalangan anak muda.
"Mereka butuh aplikasi AXISnet yang bisa mempermudah mendapatkan produk atau layanan AXIS, juga mendapatkan update informasi mengenai apa saja yang terkait dengan produk AXIS. Pelanggan AXIS adalah anak-anak muda yang dinamis, sehingga kami pun perlu menyesuaikan dengan karakter dan kebutuhan mereka," ujarnya. Menurut David, ada beberapa fitur baru yang menjadi highlight di aplikasi AXISnet. Pertama, fitur kunci pulsa (lock botton feature). Fitur ini merupakan yang pertama di Indonesia guna menghindarkan pelanggan dari kemungkinan pemotongan pulsa milik mereka secara otomatis karena terkena tarif dasar internet saat kuota habis atau hal tak terduga lainnya. Kedua, fitur Special Offer Customized Product. Fitur ini secara otomatis akan mengindentifikasi karakter pelanggan dalam menggunakan layanan AXIS sehari-hari. Alhasil, pelanggan akan diberikan penawaran paket AXIS dengan harga/promo spesial sesuai kebutuhan pelanggan. Selain itu, pelanggan juga bisa memperoleh harga produk terbaik di AXISnet. Ketiga, layanan “Super Sureprize”, merupakan program undian yang hanya bisa diikuti oleh pelanggan AXIS. Untuk mengikuti program “Super Sureprize” ini, pelanggan hanya cukup membeli paket internet bulanan yang dapat dibeli melalui aplikasi AXISnet atau voucher AIGO di toko pulsa. Jika dengan voucher AIGO, pelanggan hanya perlu scan kode AIGO di aplikasi AXISnet. Setelahnya, secara otomatis pelanggan akan terdaftar dalam program dan memiliki kesempatan memenangkan hadiah utama sepeda motor, smartphone, laptop dan hadiah menarik lainnya.Selanjutnya akan menyusul di bulan November ini, fitur multipayment. Fitur ini memberikan kemudahaan pelanggan saat melakukan pembelian paket AXIS, selain membayar dengan pulsa, mereka juga bisa melakukan pembayaran melalui beragam platform digital yang tersedia.Brand AXIS merupakan bagian dari XL Axiata yang ditujukan untuk pelanggan segmen anak-anak muda, termasuk mahasiswa. Saat ini AXIS memiliki produk unggulan yaitu paket OWSEM dan paket Boostr, yang mampu memenuhi kebutuhan pelanggan. Pada produk OWSEM, pelanggan bisa mendapatkan manfaat berupa unlimited gaming dengan kuota utama, kuota sosial media, kuota malam dan kuota musik. 
Sementara itu, pada produk Boostr pelanggan bisa mendapatkan manfaat berupa paket internet untuk aplikasi, yang bisa dipilih sesuai dengan kebutuhan mereka, kedua paket ini pun bisa pelanggan dapatkan melalui aplikasi AXISnet. Layanan AXIS didukung oleh jaringan infrastruktur XL Axiata yang tersebar hingga pelosok-pelosok Indonesia, dengan lebih dari 129.000 BTS termasuk lebih dari 53.000 BTS 3G dan lebih dari 39.000 BTS 4G. Saat ini layanan 4G XL Axiata sudah hadir di 410 kota/kabupaten di berbagai hampir semua provinsi.

Enhancing Customer Convenience, New Features Enrich the AXISnet Application
Nov 04 2019, 10:18 by Heri Firmansyah



Enhancing Customer Convenience, New Features Enrich the AXISnet Application



Enhancing Customer Convenience, New Features Enrich the AXISnet Application


KBRN, Jakarta: PT XL Axiata Tbk (XL Axiata) through the AXIS brand continues to make it easier for young customers to get service products through digital channels, namely the AXISnet application.
Digital-based facilities that have been launched since 2016 have now been enriched with a number of features that make it easier for customers to obtain various information and benefits about various AXIS services. Customers can take advantage of the features mentioned starting November 1, 2019, through the AXISnet application that can be downloaded via Playstore for Android users and in the near future at Apple Store for iOS users. XL Axiata's Chief Marketing Officer, David Arcelus Oses said, his party continues to innovate to bring more pleasant services to AXIS loyal customers, mostly from young people.
"They need the AXISnet application that can make it easier to get AXIS products or services, also get updated information about anything related to AXIS products. AXIS customers are dynamic young people, so we also need to adjust to their character and needs," he said . According to David, there are several new features that are highlighted in the AXISnet application. First, the pulse lock feature (lock botton feature). This feature is the first in Indonesia to prevent customers from automatically deducting their credit due to the basic internet tariff when the quota runs out or other unexpected things. Second, the Special Offer Customized Product features. This feature will automatically identify the customer's character in using AXIS daily services. As a result, customers will be offered AXIS package deals with special prices / promos according to customer needs. In addition, customers can also get the best product prices on AXISnet. Third, the service "Super Sureprize", is a lottery program that can only be followed by AXIS customers. To join the "Super Sureprize" program, customers only need to buy a monthly internet package that can be purchased through the AXISnet application or AIGO vouchers at the credit shop. If with an AIGO voucher, customers only need to scan the AIGO code in the AXISnet application. After that, customers will automatically be enrolled in the program and have a chance to win top prizes for motorcycles, smartphones, laptops and other attractive prizes. Next will follow in this November, the multipayment feature. This feature provides the convenience of customers when purchasing AXIS packages, in addition to paying by credit, they can also make payments through a variety of available digital platforms. AXIS brand is a part of XL Axiata aimed at customers of young children, including students. At present AXIS has superior products namely the OWSEM package and the Boostr package, which are able to meet customer needs. In OWSEM products, customers can get benefits in the form of unlimited gaming with the main quota, social media quota, night quota and music quota.
Meanwhile, on Boostr products customers can get benefits in the form of internet packages for applications, which can be chosen according to their needs, both of these packages can also be obtained by customers through the AXISnet application. AXIS services are supported by XL Axiata's infrastructure network which is spread throughout Indonesia, with more than 129,000 BTS including more than 53,000 3G BTS and more than 39,000 4G BTS. Currently XL Axiata 4G services are already present in 410 cities / districts in various almost all provinces.
